name: The Armorer
desc: A master of the forge who shapes metal into protective gear.

name: The Tanner
desc: A master of the wild who respects the kill, using toughened hides to forge unbreakable protection.

name: The Architect
desc: Shaper of the Archives' physical presence, turning raw timber into the grand structures of our civilization.

name: The Weaponsmith
desc: The thunder of the forge follows you. You turn cold iron into the heat of battle-ready steel.

name: The Weaver
desc: Master of delicate fibers and resilient threads, weaving the very fabric of identity for the Archive members.

name: The Butcher
desc: A master butcher, capable of various cuts to create the finest meat products.

name: The Blacksmith
desc: Forging the tools of war and peace, shaping metal into weapons and armor that stand the test of time.
